mark_your_failure.name: Mark Your Failure

trigger.text: When you make an action roll and score a miss...

mark_your_failure.text: __When you make an action roll and score a miss,__ mark a tick on your failure track. If you score a miss when making a progress roll, mark three ticks.

_source.title: Learn From Your Failures in Starforged

learn_from_your_failures.name: Learn From Your Failures

trigger.text: When you spend time reflecting on your hardships and missteps, and your failure track is +6 or greater...

learn_from_your_failures.text:
__When you spend time reflecting on your hardships and missteps,__ and your failure track is +6 or greater, roll your challenge dice and compare to your progress.

On a __strong hit,__ you commit to a dramatic change. Mark one box on your quests legacy track, clear all progress on the failure track, and choose one.

  * Change course: Discard a single asset, take 2 experience for each marked ability, and [Advance](move:starforged/legacy/advance) to spend this experience on new assets or upgrades. Unused experience is discarded.
  * Make it right: [Swear an Iron Vow](move:starforged/quest/swear_an_iron_vow) and reroll any dice.
  * Ready your next steps: Take +3 momentum.

On a __weak hit,__ you learn from your mistakes. Mark two ticks on your quests legacy track and clear all progress on the failure track.

On a __miss,__ you’ve learned the wrong lessons. Mark 1 tick on your quests legacy track and clear all progress on the failure track. Then, envision how you set off on an ill-fated path.
